DOC.HEADLINE: 1st LD: 2 Chinese tourists die in boat collision in Thailand

TEXT.P: Two Chinese tourists died as two speed boats Wednesday collided off Thailand's Pattaya coast.
According to the officials from Chinese embassy in Thailand, another nine chinese tourists were injured during the collision at about 12:30 local time.
One of the speed boats was carrying Chinese tourists and another was carrying tourists from South Korea.
Altogether 14 tourists sustained injuries in the accident.
Beach resort town Pattaya is located in Thailand's eastern province of Chon-bu- ri.
